author: olegk
msg: HTTPCORE-118: Purge closed sessions prior to opening new ones. This should reduce chances of running out of memory when opening and closing lots of NIO connections in a tight loop.

author: cziegeler
msg: Timed events can be stopped by resending a timed event with the same id but without scheduling information (fixes SLING-26)
